steps.text: Malta Ground, RYR4735, request taxi to runway 31, Stand 4.
RYR4735, taxi to holding point C1 via Alpha and Charlie, contact Tower on 118.3 at C1.
Malta Tower, RYR4735, holding short runway 31 at C1, ready for departure.
RYR4735, roger, runway 31 cleared for takeoff.
Cleared for takeoff runway 31, RYR4735.
Malta Tower, RYR4735, airborne, passing 1000 feet.
RYR4735, roger, contact Malta Radar on 128.15.
Malta Radar, RYR4735, climbing passing 1500 feet.

takeoff.name: Takeoff Simulation - Air Malta TCAS Fault

steps.text: Malta Ground, KM514, request taxi to runway 31, Stand 5.
KM514, taxi to holding point C1 via Alpha and Charlie, contact Tower 118.3 at C1.
Malta Tower, KM514, holding short runway 31 at C1, ready for departure.
Malta Tower, KM514, we have a TCAS fault, request return to stand.
KM514, roger, hold position, standby.
KM514, taxi to Stand 5 via Charlie and Alpha, contact Ground on 121.9.
Taxi to Stand 5 via Charlie and Alpha, contact Ground 121.9, KM514.

takeoff.name: Takeoff Simulation - Lufthansa Bird Strike Rejection

steps.text: Malta Ground, DLH1307, request taxi to runway 31, Stand 7.
DLH1307, taxi to holding point C1 via Alpha and Charlie, contact Tower 118.3 at C1.
Malta Tower, DLH1307, holding short runway 31 at C1, ready for departure.
DLH1307, runway 31 cleared for takeoff.
DLH1307 rejecting takeoff due bird strike, request assistance.
DLH1307, roger, vacate runway if able, emergency services dispatched.
DLH1307 vacating runway 31, standing by for inspection.
DLH1307, roger, runway 31 closed, notify when ready.
Malta Radar, KM514, maintaining FL340, direct DIBAK.
KM514, radar contact, proceed direct EVIRA.
Direct EVIRA, KM514.
KM514, expect handoff to Rome Control in 15 miles.
Rome Control expected in 15 miles, KM514.
KM514, contact Rome Control now on 132.35, good day.
132.35 to Rome Control, KM514, good day.
Malta Radar, DLH1307, PAN PAN PAN, we have a medical emergency, request descent and diversion to nearest suitable airport.
DLH1307, roger PAN, state nature of emergency and souls on board.
One passenger unconscious, breathing difficulties. 168 persons on board, DLH1307.
DLH1307, descend to FL100, proceed direct MALTA VOR, expect ILS runway 31 at Luqa.
Descending FL100, direct MALTA VOR, DLH1307.
DLH1307, radar vectors to final approach, emergency services will meet you on arrival.
DLH1307, roger, ready for vectors.
DLH1307, contact Malta Tower now on 118.3.
RYR4735, Malta Radar, do you read?
RYR4735, Malta Radar, if you read, squawk IDENT or contact on 128.15.
All stations, Malta Radar, relay to RYR4735, attempt contact on 128.15.
Malta Radar, initiating radio failure procedures for RYR4735.
Malta Radar, RYR4735, radio failure resolved, re-established contact on 128.15.
RYR4735, roger, confirm FL380 and routing direct DORAT.
Affirm, maintaining FL380, direct DORAT, RYR4735.
RYR4735, continue as filed, monitor 128.15.
Continuing as filed, monitoring 128.15, RYR4735.
Malta Approach, KM102, descending to 3,000 feet, approaching DIBAK.
KM102, radar contact. Proceed direct MALTA VOR, expect ILS approach runway 31.
Direct MALTA VOR, expecting ILS 31, KM102.
KM102, descend to 2,000 feet, cleared ILS approach runway 31.
Descending to 2,000 feet, cleared ILS 31, KM102.
KM102, contact Luqa Tower on 135.10.
Switching to 135.10, KM102.

landing.name: Landing Simulation - Go-Around Due to Runway Incursion

steps.text: Luqa Tower, DLH1307, established ILS runway 13, 5 miles final.
DLH1307, continue approach, caution: vehicle reported near runway threshold.
Continuing approach, DLH1307.
DLH1307, go around, I say again, go around. Vehicle on runway.
Going around, DLH1307.
DLH1307, fly runway heading, climb to 3,000 feet.
Runway heading, climbing to 3,000 feet, DLH1307.
DLH1307, contact Luqa Approach on 118.35.
Switching to 118.35, DLH1307.

landing.name: Landing Simulation - Low Visibility CAT II Approach

steps.text: Malta Approach, RYR4735, descending to 2,500 feet, approaching DORAT.
RYR4735, radar contact. Proceed direct MALTA VOR, expect CAT II ILS approach runway 31. RVR reported at 350 meters.
Direct MALTA VOR, expecting CAT II ILS 31, RYR4735.
RYR4735, descend to 1,800 feet, cleared CAT II ILS approach runway 31.
Descending to 1,800 feet, cleared CAT II ILS 31, RYR4735.
RYR4735, contact Luqa Tower on 135.10.
Switching to 135.10, RYR4735.
